In a study conducted to characterize the pulmonary and extrapulmonary mechanical behaviors of patients with ARDS, Gattinoni et al. found that patients with extrapulmonary ARDS had high IAP levels. Therefore, these finding can be used to describe the abdominal hypertension effect on ARDS. (
